effect.full: This Pokémon's Attack is doubled in battle. This bonus does not count as a stat modifier. This ability functions identically to huge power.

description.diamond-pearl: Boosts the power of physical attacks.
description.platinum: Boosts the power of physical attacks.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Boosts the power of physical attacks.
description.sun-moon: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.
description.sword-shield: Using its pure power, the Pokémon doubles its Attack stat.
